long_description: A bit warmer than our REI Travel Sack, the ultralight REI Travel Down Sleeping Bag is designed for hostelling, summer camping, RVs or, in severe cold, it can be used as a liner inside another bag. Lightweight 600-fill-power duck down fill provides warmth down to about 45degF; it also packs down small. Roomy mummy shape provides space to move around. 2-way zip lets you open the bag fully for use as a quilt or unzips at the bottom for ventilation. Differentiated drawcords (1 round, 1 flat) let you adjust hood and neck easily in the dark. Inner pocket is handy to stow a phone, glasses, flashlight or other essentials. Polyester shell is treated with a durable water repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. The REI Travel Down Sleeping Bag comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: A bit warmer than our REI Travel Sack, the ultralight REI Travel Down Sleeping Bag is designed for hostelling, summer camping, RVs or, in severe cold, it can be used as a liner inside another bag.
